title: Kazuhiro Mori (footballer)
text:
is a former <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Playing career.
Mori was born in <a href="Osaka%20Prefecture">Osaka Prefecture</a> on April 17, 1981. He joined <a href="J1%20League">J1 League</a> club <a href="Vissel%20Kobe">Vissel Kobe</a> from youth team in 2000. Although he played several matches as midfielder like every season, he could not play many matches. In 2005, he moved to <a href="Japanese%20Regional%20Leagues">Regional Leagues</a> club <a href="Roasso%20Kumamoto">Rosso Kumamoto</a>. Although he could not play many matches, the club was promoted to <a href="Japan%20Football%20League">Japan Football League</a> from 2006. In 2007, he moved to Regional Leagues club <a href="Banditonce%20Kakogawa">Banditonce Kobe</a>. However he could hardly play in the match and retired end of 2007 season.
